goals__remit:
The GAFM ® International Board of Standards of the Global Academy of Finance and Management ® provides several different graduate standards programs, exams, and professional designations in General and International Finance, Risk Management, Wealth Management, Management Consulting, Certified Project Management, IT-Project Management, Project Risk, Program Mgt., Strategic Project Management and Planning, and Tactical Project Management or Quality Control, Management Consulting, Financial Anaysis, Engineering, Human Resources, Sustainability and Human Resources etc. Dedicated to the establishment of high professional standards for the Project Management industry, using a set of certification programs in conjunction with the Global  Academy of Finance and Management and AAPM AAFM 
 
The GAFM ® owns the trademarks in the EU, China and USA for various marks including:  
• CWM  Chartered Wealth Manager ® is a USA Trademark and  International Trademark 
• MFP ® Master Financial Planner ® Charter Designation and Board Certification ® is also a Registered Trademark. # 4009142
